result.html: Col ceathrar liom íShe is my (first) cousin.
result.ponchtml: Col ceaṫrar liom íShe is my (first) cousin.

result.ga: Col seisir le Máire a bhí inti
result.orig: Col seisir le Máire a bhí inti
result.html: Col seisir le Máire a bhí intiShe was Máire's second cousin.
result.ponchtml: Col seisir le Máire a ḃí intiShe was Máire's second cousin.

result.html: Bhí col aici láithreach liomShe disliked me immediately.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí col aici láiṫreaċ liomShe disliked me immediately.

result.eng: He particularly hates the royal family.
result.ga: Tá col ar leith aige leis an teaghlach ríoga
result.orig: Tá col ar leith aige leis an teaghlach ríoga
result.html: Tá col ar leith aige leis an teaghlach ríogaHe particularly hates the royal family.
result.ponchtml: Tá col ar leiṫ aige leis an teaġlaċ ríogaHe particularly hates the royal family.

result.ga: Ghlac sé col leo ar an toirt
result.orig: Ghlac sé col leo ar an toirt
result.html: Ghlac sé col leo ar an toirtHe disliked them immediately.
result.ponchtml: Ġlac sé col leo ar an toirtHe disliked them immediately.

result.eng: The smell of the blood revolted him.
result.ga: Chuir boladh na fola col air
result.orig: Chuir boladh na fola col air

result.ponchtml: Ċuir bolaḋ na fola col airThe smell of the blood revolted him.
